column3: passed away on sunday morning june 21
column4: 2015 at his home surrounded by his loving family. quentin was born on march 31
column7: the son of quentin and alice (thorsberry) mullins
column8: sr. he grew up in puncheon creek and graduated from the knott county high school. he is retired from whirlpool working as a press operator for over 46 years. on may 21
column10: quentin was united in marriage to kim s. rinbolt in marion. quentin was an avid sports fan
column11: especially enjoying uk basketball. he also liked bowling and was a fan of all the cleveland teams. he was a longtime member of the marion moose lodge and was a dedicated member of the marion area harley riders association. quentin is now set out to journey to another adventure out on the open roadhe is survived by his wife kim mullins; his children: natalie (jamie) powers
column14: kelli rudd and toni rudd; grandchildren: quentin mullins

column20: donations may be made to the oncology department of wyandot memorial hospital. the denzer-farison-hottinger & snyder funeral home is honored to be serving quentins family and condolences may be sent to the family at www. snyder. funeralhomes. com. joanne gentile stephens says: june 21
